Header: Heroin worth over Rs 8.8mn taken into custody
Content: Colombo (News1st) – One suspect was arrested in Kadawatha on Friday (Aug 31st) with a stock of heroin worth over Rs. 8.8mn. A total of 740.145 grams of heroin was discovered in the suspect’s possession. The police anti-narcotics bureau made the arrest last night as the suspect was transporting the drugs on a motorbike. The Police also took into custody a total of Rs. 233,920 that was in the suspect’s possession.
